alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 3:55PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ST. JOHNS...CENTRAL CLAY AND SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EST... At 354 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Atlantic Beach to near Mandarin to Keystone Heights. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, and World Golf Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay
